ABOUT.TITLE: About ReadyToEnjoy
ABOUT.WHAT_IS_CONTENT: ReadyToEnjoy is an innovative platform designed to connect people through shared activities. We believe that the best experiences are born when people come together to enjoy unique moments together.
ABOUT.MISSION_INTRO: Create a vibrant community where users can:
ABOUT.MISSION_POINT1: Discover new activities and exciting experiences
ABOUT.MISSION_POINT2: Share their own ideas and activity suggestions
ABOUT.MISSION_POINT3: Connect with people who share their same interests
ABOUT.HOW_WORKS_CONTENT: ReadyToEnjoy works as a collaborative ecosystem where each user can be both contributor and beneficiary. You can propose activities that you are passionate about and, at the same time, discover the incredible suggestions that other community members have shared.
ABOUT.TEAM_INTRO: ReadyToEnjoy is the result of collaboration between two developers passionate about creating exceptional digital experiences:
ABOUT.ROCIO_DESCRIPTION: Frontend development specialist, she has developed the web user interface using Angular with Ionic for the frontend and Firebase as the backend platform, creating a smooth and attractive experience with a modern and responsive interface that works perfectly on all devices.
ABOUT.VERONICA_DESCRIPTION: Expert in native Android development, she has developed a robust application in Kotlin integrated with Strapi as backend, implementing Material Design 3 to offer an exceptional native experience. The infrastructure is deployed on Render to guarantee high availability and performance.
ABOUT.COMMUNITY_CONTENT: ReadyToEnjoy is not just an application, it is a community of people who believe in the power of shared experiences. Every activity suggested, every connection made and every moment enjoyed contributes to creating a more connected and fun world.
ABOUT.CTA_TEXT: Are you ready to enjoy? Join ReadyToEnjoy today!
ABOUT.INFO1: Welcome to ReadyToEnjoy! A project designed to inspire you to make new adventures both alone and in company, making memories of fun, new and exciting experiences.
ABOUT.INFO2: ReadyToEnjoy is a platform/tool in which you register and can access the different activities uploaded, both by you and by the different adventurers (registered users), the intention of the app is to create a forum, where users can upload ideas of activities that you can do in your area where they will put the place separated by provinces of Andalusia (for now), the approximate price of the activity, and a brief description of where you can get information or book if necessary and your experience.

ACTIVIDADES.NO_ACTIVIDADES_UBICACION: No activities found in this location
ACTIVIDADES.TOCA_UBICACION: Tap a location to view the map

ERRORS.DESCRIPTION_REQUIRED: *You must enter a description of at least 10 characters
ERRORS.TITLE_INVALID: *Please enter a title with more than 2 characters
ERRORS.UBI_INVALID: *Location must be at least two characters

ERRORS.NAME_INVALID: *The name must be at least two characters
ERRORS.SURNAME_INVALID: *Your surname must be at least two characters
ERRORS.CONTRASEÑA_INVALID: *At least 8 characters, one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one digit and one special character (@$!%*?&.)
ERRORS.EMAIL_ALREADY_EXISTS: *This email is already registered. Try with another user

USER_MANAGEMENT.TITLE: User Management
USER_MANAGEMENT.PANEL_DESCRIPTION: From here you can manage all users registered in ReadyToEnjoy. You can view detailed information and delete accounts if necessary.
USER_MANAGEMENT.WARNING_MESSAGE: User deletion is permanent and irreversible. All their data and activities will be deleted.
USER_MANAGEMENT.NO_USERS: There are no users registered in the system.
USER_MANAGEMENT.NO_PERMISSIONS_MESSAGE: You don't have permissions to access this section. This functionality is reserved only for system managers.
USER_MANAGEMENT.CONFIRM_DELETE_MESSAGE:
Delete user "{username}"?

This action will permanently delete:
• The user profile
• All their activities
• All their data

It CANNOT be undone!
